name: Killing the Colorado

Official site: this is a direct link to discoverys web site - https://corporate.discovery.com/discovery-newsroom/discovery-channels-killing-the-colorado-brings-together-five-academy-award-winning-filmmakers-to-tell-the-true-story-of-the-american-wests-crippling-water-crisis/

description: The American West is in the midst of a serious drought, which compounds the underlying water crisis that stems for overdevelopment, misuse, and political maneuvers carried out long ago.
